channel.description: Recent content in Bollywood on TechnoStreet

item.title: Aankhen 2: रणबीर कपूर थे 'आंखें 2' के लिए पसंद, क्या Rishi Kapoor के कारण नहीं बन पाई फिल्म? सामने आया मेकर्स का ये बयान

item.title: Year Ender 2022: 'लाल सिंह चड्ढा' से लेकर 'थैंक गॉड' तक, साल 2022 में कई बड़ी फिल्में रही फ्लॉप, लागत भी वसूल नहीं कर पाई
item.description: Year Ender 2022: ‘लाल सिंह चड्ढा’ से लेकर ‘थैंक गॉड’ तक, साल 2022 में कई बड़ी फिल्में रही फ्लॉप, लागत भी वसूल नहीं कर पाई Year Ender 2022: साल 2022 बॉलीवुड के लिए कुछ ज्यादा अच्छा नहीं रहा.

item.title: Prakash Raj attacks Akshay Kumar for condemning Richa Chadha's Galwan tweet: 'She is more relevant to country than you'
item.description: Prakash Raj attacks Akshay Kumar for condemning Richa Chadha’s Galwan tweet: ‘She is more relevant to country than you’ South actor Prakash Raj, on Friday, confronted actor Akshay Kumar for calling out Richa Chadha over her comment about the 2020 Galwan clash, in which several Indian Army soldiers died.

item.title: Amitabh Bachchan files civil suit to seek protection of personality rights in Delhi High Court
item.description: Amitabh Bachchan files civil suit to seek protection of personality rights in Delhi High Court Personality rights are also referred to as rights to publicity, under which a person has right to keep one's image from being commercially exploited.

item.title: Jaya Bachchan opens up on gender pay disparity, says 'the insecurity of a man...'
item.description: Jaya Bachchan opens up on gender pay disparity, says ‘the insecurity of a man…’ Navya Nanda, Shweta Bachchan Nanda, and Jaya Bachchan discussed the issue of the gender wage gap in the latest episode of Navya's podcast.

item.title: 'Full fashion': Malaika Arora trolled for 'dressing up' at Siddhaanth Vir Surryavanshi's funeral
item.description: ‘Full fashion’: Malaika Arora trolled for ‘dressing up’ at Siddhaanth Vir Surryavanshi’s funeral Bollywood actress-dancer visited late actor Siddhaanth Vir Surryavanshi's residence on Saturday to pay her last respects and meet his family.

item.title: Shweta Bachchan says kids Navya Naveli Nanda, Agastya make fun of her menopause: 'For you it's a joke, but...'
item.description: Shweta Bachchan says kids Navya Naveli Nanda, Agastya make fun of her menopause: ‘For you it’s a joke, but…’ Amitabh Bachchan's daughter Shweta Bachchan recently opened up on going through menopause and how it agitates her when her kids Navya Naveli Nanda and Agastya Nanda make fun of it.
